product_name: Columbia Splash A Little Rain Jacket - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Waterproof and breathable, the Columbia Splash A Little Rain Jacket in women's plus sizes also protects you from the elements with its longer length. You'll love the urban styling, too. Omni-Tech(TM) polyester shell is completely seam sealed; nylon taffeta lining glides on easily. Adjustable storm hood and cuffs seal out weather. Interior security pocket stows your valuables. Columbia Splash A Little Rain Jacket in women's plus sizes also offers zippered hand pockets.
short_description: Waterproof and breathable, the Columbia Splash A Little Rain Jacket in women's plus sizes also protects you from the elements with its longer length. You'll love the urban styling, too.
